description: Retrieves the API key resource details.

parameters.name: KeyName
parameters.description: The name of the API key resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key value/string of an API key.

nested_items.name: KeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the API key resource. Used when you need to specify a resource across all Amazon Web Services.
Format example: arn:aws:geo:region:account-id:key/ExampleKey.

nested_items.name: KeyName
nested_items.description: The name of the API key resource.

nested_items.name: Restrictions
nested_items.description: API Restrictions on the allowed actions, resources, and referers for an API key resource.

nested_items.name: AllowActions
nested_items.description: A list of allowed actions that an API key resource grants permissions to perform. You must have at least one action for each type of resource. For example, if you have a place resource, you must include at least one place action.
geo:GetMap* - Allows all actions needed for map rendering.
geo:GetMap* - Allows all actions needed for map rendering.
geo:SearchPlaceIndexForText - Allows geocoding.
geo:SearchPlaceIndexForText - Allows geocoding.
geo:SearchPlaceIndexForPosition - Allows reverse geocoding.
geo:SearchPlaceIndexForSuggestions - Allows generating suggestions from text.
GetPlace - Allows finding a place by place ID.
geo:CalculateRoute - Allows point to point routing.
geo:CalculateRoute - Allows point to point routing.
geo:CalculateRouteMatrix - Allows calculating a matrix of routes.

nested_items.name: AllowResources
nested_items.description: A list of allowed resource ARNs that a API key bearer can perform actions on.
The ARN must be the correct ARN for a map, place, or route ARN. You may include wildcards in the resource-id to match multiple resources of the same type.
The resources must be in the same partition, region, and account-id as the key that is being created.
Other than wildcards, you must include the full ARN, including the arn, partition, service, region, account-id and resource-id delimited by colons (:).
No spaces allowed, even with wildcards. For example, arn:aws:geo:region:account-id:map/ExampleMap*.

nested_items.name: AllowReferers
nested_items.description: An optional list of allowed HTTP referers for which requests must originate from. Requests using this API key from other domains will not be allowed.
Contain only alphanumeric characters (A---Z, a---z, 0---9) or any symbols in this list $\-._+!*`(),;/?:@=&
May contain a percent (%) if followed by 2 hexadecimal digits (A-F, a-f, 0-9); this is used for URL encoding purposes.

May contain wildcard characters question mark (?) and asterisk (*). Question mark (?) will replace any single character (including hexadecimal digits). Asterisk (*) will replace any multiple characters (including multiple hexadecimal digits).
No spaces allowed. For example, https://example.com.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the API key resource was created in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: ExpireTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the API key resource will expire in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the API key resource was last updated in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The optional description for the API key resource.
(string) ---
(string) ---
